
…or create a new repository on the command line

echo "# Stripe_ShoppingWeb" >> README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/RKOP411/Stripe_ShoppingWeb.git
git push -u origin main



…or push an existing repository from the command line

echo "# Stripe_ShoppingWeb" >> README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/RKOP411/Stripe_ShoppingWeb.git
git push -u origin main
